盛装舞步；花式骑术训练；驯马技术

扮俏的女人, 老来俏
衣着优雅；着装讲究；穿着考究

高雅的穿着；雅致的穿着；雅致的衣着
穿着优雅的女士；穿着考究的女士；衣着典雅的女士
穿着一本正经的人；衣着朴素的人
穿着得体的商人；穿着得体的经销商
着装雅致的妇女；盛装打扮的妇女

bilingual.source: Some children are dressed up as Roman soldiers.
bilingual.target: 一些孩子打扮成罗马士兵。

bilingual.source: We dressed up and made a funny play.
bilingual.target: 我们打扮了一下，演了一个有趣的戏。

bilingual.source: He dressed up as a bogey for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 他在万圣节打扮成妖怪。

bilingual.source: He dressed up as a joker for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 他万圣节打扮成了小丑。

bilingual.source: He dressed up as micky for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 他在万圣节打扮成米老鼠。

bilingual.source: She dressed up as a ninja for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 她在万圣节打扮成忍者。

bilingual.source: She dressed up as a Jedi for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 她在万圣节打扮成了绝地。

bilingual.source: He dressed up as a clown for the party.
bilingual.target: 他打扮成小丑参加了派对。

bilingual.source: She dressed up as a witch for Halloween.
bilingual.target: 她在万圣节打扮成一个女巫。

yingyinNormal.en: She's standing right there. I'm dressed better than she is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她就站在那儿呢，我可比她打扮得好多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Pedro Pony is dressed up as a cowboy. Hi. Ahoy, there, me hearties. It is Granddad dog dressed up as a pirate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩德罗打扮成了牛仔的样子。你们好啊，我的小宝贝们。就连狗爷爷也打扮成了海盗的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa is dressed as a fairy princess. And George is dressed as a dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇化妆成一位仙女公主，乔治打扮成一只恐龙。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig is dressed as a fireman. Mummy, why are you dressed like that? I'm going to the Mummy's fire engine practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈打扮成了消防员。妈妈，你为什么要打扮成这样呢？因为我要去参加妈妈消防联盟的练习呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa is dressed as a fairy princess. And George is dressed as a dinosaur. Dine-saw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪化妆成一位仙女公主，乔治打扮成一只恐龙。恐龙。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, fine. Do you want to know why I dressed like The Hulk?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。你想知道我为什么要打扮成绿巨人么?

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. The premise is that he is dressed differently? Yeah. That's true. He is not dressed the same.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，哏都是在嘲讽他打扮跟平常不一样吗？对啊。的确啊。是跟平常差很多。

yingyinNormal.en: What is Monica's biggest pet peeve? Animals dressed as humans. That's correct.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡最受不了什么？动物打扮得像人。答对了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you dressed up? You're not the only one with a date tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡，打扮得这么美干嘛？今晚又不是只有你有约会而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Aw, look at you two, all dressed up. Going out for dinner? Ba Ba Sushi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看你俩，都盛装打扮好了，要出门吃晚餐啊？芭芭寿司。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, and the reason I'm dressed like this is because I think it's nice to look nice for your gay husband.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这样打扮是因为我要让我的同性恋丈夫有面子。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh Pheebs, is that a new ankle bracelet? Wow. And you got a pedicure. Your feet are all dressed up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，那是新脚链吗？你去修过脚趾甲。你的脚打扮过。

yingyinNormal.en: We better get you dressed, because you have reservations for two tonight, for dinner at Oranjee. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得好好打扮一下了，因为今晚你们两个要在奥兰记餐厅吃晚饭。喔。

yingyinNormal.en: You ordered a stripper for the shower? That is totally inappropriate. What? He's gonna be dressed as a baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你请脱衣舞男来宝宝欢迎会？那太不适当了。为什么？他会打扮成宝宝的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Today is Danny Dog's Birthday. He is having a party. Yoo hoho. Everyone has come dressed as a pirate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是小狗丹尼的生日。他要举办一个生日派对。哟吼吼！大家都打扮成了海盗的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, who cares what I think? I do. You're the coolest, prettiest, best-dressed person in my life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再说，我的想法有啥所谓啊？对我有所谓因为你是我生命中，最酷，最漂亮，最会打扮的人。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been sitting there for the last half-hour trying to come up with a story that would explain my being here dressed like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在外面坐了半个多小时，一直想编出个理由向你们解释，我这身打扮出现的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: She's just getting dressed now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她已经开始换衣服了。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't you dressed yet? Am I naked again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还没穿衣服？我又光着身体了？

yingyinNormal.en: Suzy sheep is dressed up her nurse costume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西羊正在穿她的护士套装。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: She was <highlight>dressed</highlight> as she always was.
All things grown-ups tell you —— such as being polite, and being well-<highlight>dressed</highlight> —— are very important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大人告诉你的所有事情——比如礼貌、穿着得体——都是非常重要的。
